name: ASCOCORO (INSA)
description:
A downloadable game for Windows 

Trigger warning: death, injury, natural disaster, human relationship trauma

- ABOUT -

ASCOCORO is a drama, about an useless, poor little hero.  Poor hero, Asco steps into a labyrinth where only true heroes come out alive.  But they understands. The real purpose of this labyrinth is...

This game includes

  • Cute stickman characters
  • Heartbreaking story
  • One chase time!
  • Exploration puzzles

Feedback Form_https://forms.gle/SyHZ8MpeTNerSAUPA

- FEATURES -

16k words, 100 illustrations, One endings
